languages.text: {n}Кляйн едва не роняет скальпель.{/n} "Но какими же методами нам тогда искать истину, Ваша Светлость? Чернь же по-хорошему не понимает".
{n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."
languages.original_text: {n}Кляйн едва не роняет скальпель.{/n} "Но какими же методами нам тогда искать истину, Ваша Светлость? Чернь же по-хорошему не понимает".

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."
{n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."

{n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."
{n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."

languages.text: {n}克莱因差点把手中的手术刀掉在地上。{/n}“可除此之外，我们还能通过什么别的方法来找到真相呢，大人？那些乌合之众根本不懂得其他方式。”
languages.original_text: {n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因差点把手中的手术刀掉在地上。{/n}“可除此之外，我们还能通过什么别的方法来找到真相呢，大人？那些乌合之众根本不懂得其他方式。”

languages.text: {n}A Klein casi se le cae el bisturí de las manos.{/n} «¿Pero entonces qué otros medios nos quedan para sonsacar la verdad, mi{mf|lord|lady}? La plebe no entiende de otras maneras».
languages.original_text: {n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."

traits.locale_text: {n}A Klein casi se le cae el bisturí de las manos.{/n} «¿Pero entonces qué otros medios nos quedan para sonsacar la verdad, mi{mf|lord|lady}? La plebe no entiende de otras maneras».

languages.text: {n}クラインはメスを落としそうになった。 {/n}「しかし、私たちに残された真実追求の方法は何でしょうか？民衆はそれ以外の方法を理解できないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."

traits.locale_text: {n}クラインはメスを落としそうになった。 {/n}「しかし、私たちに残された真実追求の方法は何でしょうか？民衆はそれ以外の方法を理解できないのです」

languages.text: {n}Klein lässt beinahe sein Skalpell fallen.{/n} "Aber welche Methoden der Wahrheitsfindung bleiben uns dann noch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Das Gesindel versteht keine andere Sprache."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein lässt beinahe sein Skalpell fallen.{/n} "Aber welche Methoden der Wahrheitsfindung bleiben uns dann noch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Das Gesindel versteht keine andere Sprache."

languages.text: {n}Klein manque de faire tomber son scalpel.{/n} « Mais alors, quel moyen nous reste-t-il pour découvrir la vérité, Votre Seigneurie ? La populace ne comprend guère que la manière forte. »
languages.original_text: {n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein manque de faire tomber son scalpel.{/n} « Mais alors, quel moyen nous reste-t-il pour découvrir la vérité, Votre Seigneurie ? La populace ne comprend guère que la manière forte. »

languages.text: {n}Klein, neşterini düşürecek gibi oluyor.{/n} "Peki hakikati arayışımızda bize başka ne yöntem bıraktınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Ayaktakımı başka dilden anlamaz."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein almost drops his scalpel.{/n} "But what methods of seeking the truth remain to us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? The rabble do not understand any other way."
